branchCategory.name: NC(D)A1, NFPA, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Temperature Resistant Options
branchCategory.description: <p>Series NCA1 medium duty tie rod cylinders are NFPA interchangeable, have a crimped piston rod assembly, are pre-lubricated and available in 12 mounting styles. Bore sizes range from 1.5 to 4 inches.  The XB6 high temperature resistant option is rated for use in environments up to 300° F (150° C). The XB7 low temperature resistant option is rated for use in environments down to -22° F (-30° C)</p>

breadCrumb.name: NC(D)A1, NFPA, Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Temperature Resistant Options
